clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in asthma

contraindications.disease: Good safety profile observed in preclinical and clinical studies
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: R411 is a non steroid oral medicine for the treatment of asthma It is not immunosuppressive but blocks the activation and recruitment of cells involved in respiratory inflammation It is a dual acting competitive integrin antagonist as compared to previously developed single integrin antagonists or SIAs that prevents binding of V CAM1 to either a4b1 or a4b7
